name: IMAGINATION (NoFaceGames)
description:
IMAGINATION is a game where you draw and an AI judges your drawing.

That first sentence really just sums the game up.

IMAGINATION was a project I started developing in 2019, with many concepts, ideas, tests, we're ready to release it to the public!

Currently, IMAGINATION is work-in-progress, with many more features coming, such as Versus Mode/Multiplayer!

Note that this game is in its alpha state, and a real AI has not been crafted yet, its legit just random-based but if you draw nothing it auto-gives you an F haha
